body_html: Ah this might be because configure has new questions - enable mkl support and whether or not to download mkl from the web. You will have to modify your automation script to cater to those questions (both yes for mkl). Sorry, I should've mentioned that.

body: Ah this might be because configure has new questions - enable mkl support and whether or not to download mkl from the web. You will have to modify your automation script to cater to those questions (both yes for mkl). Sorry, I should've mentioned  that.
